comment: This is a rectangular text block containing Chinese characters in an ancient script (likely seal script or a similar form), arranged in vertical columns from right to left. Each character is accompanied by its definition, phonetic notation (using fanqie), and etymological components (e.g., '从走', '从尸'). The text appears to be from a classical Chinese dictionary or lexicographical work, possibly the *Shuowen Jiezi* or a similar source. The black border frames the entire text area, and there are marginal notes on the left edge indicating page or section information ('大三十七', '完下', '焦克').
